data.title: Table of Eclipse Dates from 1945 to 2050
data.meta_description: The latest in astrological trends by Susan Miller, comprehensive, complete, intelligent, and accurate. Your life in 3D: culture, style, romance, money, real estate, career advancement, travel, health, fitness, and more.
data.text:
Here is an eclipse table for you that goes back to 1945.

You can see themes that came up during those years due to the eclipses.

1945
